In a world where the sky was a canvas of swirling colors, there existed a school nestled inside a fluffy, white cloud. Students floated in on soft breezes, their laughter echoing like music. Lessons were taught by wise, old owls who spoke in riddles, while clouds transformed into chalkboards, displaying lessons in shimmering raindrops. Each day, students crafted dreams with stardust and learned to paint the sky with their imaginations. As they graduated, they soared into the sunset, carrying with them the magic of knowledge, forever connected to the ethereal school that danced among the stars.
